alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 11:58AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Powell and central Estill Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1157 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sandhill, or near Irvine, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Irvine, North Irvine, South Irvine and Kimbrell around 1205 PM EDT. Ravenna, Cow Creek, Doe Creek and Spout Springs around 1210 PM EDT. Cottage Furnace, Hardwick, Willow Tree and Vaughns Mill around 1215 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pitts, Stanton, Furnace, Knowlton, Fitchburg, Cobhill and Patsey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT for southeastern and east central Kentucky.
